mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question ( title, content, qna_category_id, member_id, item_group_id, hide, type ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{qnaCategoryId}, #{memberId}, #{itemGroupId}, #{hide}, #{type} )
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET title = IFNULL( #{title}, title ), content = IFNULL( #{content}, content ), qna_category_id = IFNULL( #{qnaCategoryId}, qna_category_id ), member_id = IFNULL( #{memberId}, member_id ), item_group_id = IFNULL( #{itemGroupId}, item_group_id ), hide = IFNULL( #{hide}, hide ), type = IFNULL( #{type}, type ) WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM question WHERE type = 'CUSTOMER' AND item_group_id IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question WHERE type = 'CUSTOMER' AND item_group_id IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question WHERE type = 'CUSTOMER' AND item_group_id = #{itemGroupId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question WHERE type = 'SELLER' AND item_group_id IN ( SELLER item_group_id FROM item_group WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} )
